display_long_description:
🛒 Supermarket VR – Store Manager Simulator is a realistic VR store simulator where you run your own supermarket, electronics shop, or bakery in full virtual reality. Build, manage, and grow your business in this immersive Meta Quest simulation game.

🏗️ Design Your Store
Customize your layout with shelves, cashier stations, and signage. Rent multiple shops, change your store name, and expand your retail business.

🧍‍♂️ Virtual Reality Gameplay
Walk, run, scan products, and give change using an interactive cashier simulator system. Every action feels real in this hands-on VR shopping game.

👥 Customer & Staff Simulation
Serve NPC customers, some of whom make a mess — or steal! Hire cleaners and cashiers to keep your store management smooth and efficient.

👮 Thief Mechanic & Challenge
Spot thieves before they escape. Protect your stock and keep your profit safe!

📦 Inventory & Pricing System
Stock shelves with 19+ products or custom items. Set prices based on demand (cheap, average, expensive) in this strategic store simulation.

🌦️ Immersive World
Experience day-night cycles, weather changes, random bills, and mailbox events. Sleep to start the next business day fresh.

🎮 Features for Meta Quest
✔️ XP & Leveling
✔️ Price Strategy
✔️ Shop Cleanliness
✔️ Dialogue with NPCs
✔️ Fully interactive retail simulator experience

If you love VR shop games, store simulators, or business management in virtual reality, this is your next must-play.
